author: whitlock
msg: Fix link options for Solaris. I discovered the libraries need to be linked with Cstd to get over spurious STL problems and with socket to resolve getaddrinfo and other methods at runtime.

author: dicka
msg: Initial changes for providing support for HP-UX.

author: prestonf
msg: Update to Monitor to remove and additional CR that may have been added to the chunked data chunk when it was extracted from the repository. (There is a flag in the repository that will not expand LF to CRLF and sometimes it is left on).

author: whitlock
msg: Add Solaris compiler and linker when building tests
